alert.note: Alert for Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 04 at 2:26AM MDT until September 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WIND FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 120... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 120. * TIMING...Noon to 9 PM Monday * WIND...West 10 to 20 mph and gusting to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties
